name: Pho Ga
description: A delicious Vietnamese noodle soup with tender chicken, fresh herbs, and rice noodles in a savory broth.

name: Goi Cuon
description: Fresh Vietnamese spring rolls filled with shrimp, herbs, vermicelli, and wrapped in rice paper, served with a tangy dipping sauce.

name: Hu Tieu Nam Vang
description: A flavorful Vietnamese noodle soup with pork, shrimp, and quail eggs, served in a rich, aromatic broth.

name: Tra Da
description: A refreshing Vietnamese iced tea made from brewed tea leaves, served chilled with ice.

name: Nuoc Mia
description: A sweet and refreshing Vietnamese sugarcane juice, perfect for cooling off on a hot day.

name: Banh Xeo
description: A crispy Vietnamese pancake filled with shrimp, pork, and bean sprouts, served with fresh greens and dipping sauce.

name: Ca Phe Sua Da
description: Vietnamese iced coffee made with strong brewed coffee and sweetened condensed milk, served over ice.

name: Banh Mi Thit
description: A flavorful Vietnamese sandwich with crispy baguette, pork, pâté, pickled vegetables, and fresh herbs.

name: Banh Trang Nuong
description: A popular Vietnamese snack made from grilled rice paper, often topped with egg, scallions, and savory ingredients for a crispy, flavorful bite.

name: Xoi Ga
description: A hearty dish of sticky rice served with shredded or chopped chicken, seasoned with soy sauce and garnished with fried shallots for extra crunch.

name: Bun Rieu
description: A traditional Vietnamese crab noodle soup with a tangy tomato-based broth, featuring rice noodles, crab meat, tofu, and fresh herbs.

name: Goi Ga
description: A refreshing Vietnamese chicken salad made with shredded chicken, fresh vegetables, and herbs, dressed with a light, tangy lime dressing.

name: Banh Pia
description: A sweet and flaky pastry filled with mung bean paste and traditional flavors, perfect as a dessert or snack.

name: Bun Cha
description: A popular Vietnamese dish featuring grilled pork served with rice noodles, fresh herbs, and a tangy dipping sauce.

name: Kem Xoi
description: A delightful frozen dessert featuring creamy ice cream atop sticky rice, often drizzled with coconut milk.

name: Bun Dau Mam Tom
description: A distinctive Vietnamese dish featuring rice noodles, tofu, fresh vegetables, and a pungent fermented shrimp paste for dipping.

name: Bun Oc
description: A hearty Vietnamese noodle soup that incorporates tender snails with fresh herbs, tomatoes, and a flavorful broth.

name: Banh Beo
description: A delicate Vietnamese rice cake topped with minced shrimp and crispy shallots, typically served with a savory sauce.

name: Nuoc Chanh
description: A refreshing Vietnamese lemonade made with freshly squeezed lime juice, water, and a touch of sweetness.

name: Nem Nuong
description: Grilled pork skewers seasoned with traditional spices, offering a perfect blend of smoky and savory flavors.

name: Banh Mi Cha Ca
description: A flavorful Vietnamese sandwich featuring fish cakes, fresh vegetables, and a tangy sauce, served in a crispy baguette.

name: Banh Khot
description: Tiny crispy pancakes made from rice flour, often topped with shrimp and served with a tangy dipping sauce.

name: Sinh To Bo
description: A refreshing Vietnamese smoothie with a rich blend of fresh fruits and a touch of sweetness for a nutritious boost.

name: Bun Thit Nuong
description: A vibrant Vietnamese dish featuring grilled pork served over rice noodles with fresh vegetables and a tangy dressing.

name: Com Ga
description: A comforting dish of tender chicken served over fragrant rice, accompanied by a savory broth and fresh herbs.

name: Lau Nam
description: A hearty Vietnamese hot pot featuring a flavorful broth, assorted meats, fresh vegetables, and rice noodles, perfect for sharing.

name: Che Troi Nuoc
description: A traditional Vietnamese sweet soup featuring soft, chewy rice balls in a rich, syrupy ginger sauce.

name: Sinh To Xoai
description: A refreshing Vietnamese mango smoothie made with ripe mangoes, ice, and a touch of condensed milk for extra creaminess.

name: Com Tam
description: A popular Vietnamese dish featuring broken rice served with grilled meats, a fried egg, and pickled vegetables.

name: Che Ba Mau
description: A colorful Vietnamese dessert featuring layers of sweet beans, coconut milk, and jellies, served chilled over crushed ice.

name: Bo Nuong La Lot
description: A flavorful Vietnamese dish featuring marinated beef grilled to perfection and wrapped in aromatic wild betel leaves.
